headline: This Week in Pennsylvania: Josh Shapiro & other Pa. news
author: James Wesser
sentences: In this week’s episode, Owens talks about the decrease in unemployment throughout the state as well as new COVID policies at two major colleges.
(WHTM) — In This Week in Pennsylvania, Dennis Owens reports the latest in Pa. policy and politics.
He will also talk about how the Pennsylvania State Police has donated supplies to Ukraine.
Then, analysts Chris Nicholas and Danielle Gross join in on the conversation.
Get daily news, weather, breaking news, and alerts straight to your inbox!
He will then speak to Attorney General and governor hopeful Josh Shapiro.
